Issue.creator: nileshdeotale
Issue.summary: configtx manager failed for channel ID with capital letters.
Issue.description: WARN 03f channel: nileshIBPICPZdemo0 Rejecting broadcast of config message from 10.1.92.0:1404 because of error: initializing configtx manager failed: bad channel ID: channel ID 'nileshIBPICPZdemo0' contains illegal characters I retried with a channel Id with all lower case in the name and it worked. Can channel IDs with capital letters be supported please. >
